section_title: WORKSHOP ON MODELLING, SCENARIOS AND DOWNSCALING UNDER THE NAIROBI WORK PROGRAMME:
sentences: Outlining the activities conducted under the NWP, SBSTA Chair Plume encouraged parties and other stakeholders to share their experiences and needs.

Presenters from the IPCC and World Climate Research Programme considered advances in regional climate models, downscaling techniques for developing regional or subregional climate scenarios, and capacity building.
The workshop also included a presentation from UNDP on practical steps to make climate model outputs and downscaled data more relevant to policy makers.

In the subsequent discussion, participants stressed, inter alia : dialogue between users and developers; the importance of addressing decision makers needs; a risk management approach; the use of the full range of scenarios; different temporal scales; and the utility of regional centers.
